trans-unit.source: Represents a file system directory path that should not be searched for references to add to a Web services discovery document.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo> class is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A> property contains a collection of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo> instances.
Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo"></xref> class and specifies the file system path to exclude from searches.
The value of the `path` parameter becomes the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo.Path%2A> property.
The path to exclude from searches.
Gets or sets the file system directory path that should not be searched for references to add to a discovery document.
The file system directory path that should be excluded from searches.
